node.title: Man who flew from WA to Canberra to 'flog' Treasurer Josh Frydenberg has charges dismissed
node.alt: Josh Frydenberg in a suit and tie standing in front of a lecturn in a blue room in front of an australian flag
node.description: A man who told security staff at Parliament House that he had travelled from Western Australia to Canberra to "flog" Treasurer Josh Frydenberg has all charges against him dismissed.
node.content:
["A\u00a0man who told security staff at Parliament House that he had travelled from Western Australia to Canberra\u00a0to \"flog\"\u00a0Treasurer Josh Frydenberg has had all charges against him dismissed by the ACT Magistrates Court.", "In July, Ian Stewart Mellowship pleaded guilty\u00a0to trespass and two counts of threatening to harm\u00a0Mr Frydenberg.", "The court\u00a0heard Mr Mellowship gained access to Parliament House by tailgating another car into a secure car park, but was stopped by security before he could enter the building.", "In his sentencing on Friday,\u00a0Magistrate James Lawton dismissed all three charges against Mr Mellowship.", "Magistrate\u00a0Lawton said the offences could not be considered trivial, but dismissed the charges after hearing Mr Mellowship was\u00a0now receiving mental health treatment.", "
Offending was the act of an 'unwell man'
", "", "
Mr Mellowship had all charges against him dismissed by the ACT Magistrates Court\u00a0on mental health grounds.(ABC News: Ian Cutmore)
", "Previously in his bail hearing, Mr Mellowship represented himself, but in his sentencing, he was represented by lawyer Edward Chen, who told\u00a0the court his client's actions were a result of mental illness.", "He said Mr Mellowship was clearly \"floridly unwell\" when he made the threats\u00a0and when he committed the trespass.\u00a0", "Mr Chen also told the court that Mr Mellowship was honest and cooperative with security once he gained access to the Parliament House car park.", "\"[He] never tried to hide his identity, he never even made it out of the car park,\" he said.", "\"The offence is not serious, it is the act of an unwell man.\"", "Prosecutor Cecilia Pascoe told the court the charges against Mr Mellowship should not be dropped because of the risk he could pose.", "She said Mr Mellowship\u00a0had a history of being \"violent and volatile\", which the court should consider in his sentencing.\u00a0", "But Mr Chen said his client was \"receiving mental health assistance for the first time\", and responding well to it.\u00a0", "He told the court\u00a0Mr Mellowship's\u00a0previous history of offending was due to undiagnosed mental illness, and he posed no threat so long as he was receiving\u00a0treatment.\u00a0"]
